title: Revenge of Isengard: Rohirrim Village Under Siege - Third Age Total War Mod Gameplay
description:
BATTLE STARTS AT: 6:32
The beacons have been lit and King Theoden answers the call for aid.  While he is rallying a great army, he paid for a small mercenary force to protect a village that has food and supplies for the growing army.  After the defeat at Helm's Deep and Isengard, Uruk-hai have traveled to the misty mountains to seek shelter and support from the orcs of the Misty mountains.  They now get ready to attack where Rohan is weakest!  This is the Revenge of Isengard!!! Enjoy the siege battle :D

This custom battle was made by KuroGuroChan.  He was using the Reforged Submod for Third Age Total War.  They recently updated Reforged so make sure you have the latest patch :D 


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
